Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
OpenCms supports multiple languages. By nature, each content is multi-lingual. It contains several language specific versions for each element. Typically these versions should differ. For example, text elements should contain text in the respective language.

For some content elements the values should be the same in every language. For example, images might be identical for different languages. Moreover, if you use content items for configuration, the values usually ought to be identical for each language - not language specific.

To keep values identical - independent of the language - you can configure that an element's values should be synchronized. That means, if you change the value for one language, it is changed for all languages.
